name: 吳欣怡
objective:
隨著各類型博物館廣泛使用動態影像，本課程聚焦在動態影像的歷史、理論與實踐。探究博物館內的動態影像如何以當代藝術實踐手法，重塑空間敘事，挑戰展示傳統。課程主題包含：美術館的當代影像實踐、以物為中心的博物館的展示策略、動態影像技術、策展策略和數位媒體的影響。課程預計分析藝術作品、探索展覽空間，並探討科技技術、觀眾參與和藝術表達之間，彼此交互不斷演變的關係。
With various types of museums widely incorporating moving images, this course focuses on the history, theory, and experiential aspects of such imagery. It delves into how moving images within museums, employing contemporary artistic practices, reshapes spatial narratives and challenges traditional displays. Topics include contemporary image practices in fine art museums, object-centred museum display strategies, technology, curatorial strategies, and the impact of digital media. The course entails analyzing artworks, exploring exhibition spaces, and discussing the evolving relationship between technological advancements, audience engagements, and artistic expression to cultivate critical skills in curation and interpretation.
